definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
distributed denial of service (DDOS) form of Internet attack
pinyin: fen1 bu4 shi4 ju4 jue2 fu2 wu4

sentences.english: The obvious one is the move towards the architecture that are by and large loosely coupled distributed systems.
sentences.chinese: 最明顯的一個是邁向架構，是對大松耦合分佈式系統。

sentences.english: A re-engineering framework of legacy system based on distributed environment of J2EE partition is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出基於J2EE分佈式環境的遺留系統再工程框架。

sentences.english: ZooKeeper, a coordination service for distributed applications
sentences.chinese: 針對分佈式應用程序的協調服務。

sentences.english: The nature of modern war is highly distributed coordination.
sentences.chinese: 現代戰爭的特點是高度的分佈式協同作戰。

sentences.english: This establishes entity correspondence between data that is physically distributed.
sentences.chinese: 數據之間的實體通信在物理上是分佈式的。

sentences.english: A framework for Distributed Gateway(DG) interworking with H. 323 /SIP is described.
sentences.chinese: SIP交互作用的分佈式網關的一種框架。

sentences.english: Can I use a non-XA driver in distributed transactions?
sentences.chinese: 我能在分佈式事務中使用非XA驅動嗎？

sentences.english: It is an evolution of distributed computing and modular programming.
sentences.chinese: 它是分佈式計算和模塊化編程的發展。

sentences.english: Improves the agent ordering strategy in concurrent search for solving distributed CSPs, and combines dynamic agent ordering with concurrent search.
sentences.chinese: 併發搜索是求解分佈式約束滿足問題的一個高效算法。

sentences.english: Anycast service is a new service model supporting distributed duplication.
sentences.chinese: 選播是一種支持分佈式服務器複製的新的服務模型。

sentences.english: A kind of area traffic control method based on distributed Q-Leaming is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於分佈式Q學習的區域交通協調控制算法。

sentences.english: Approaches to governance range from centralized to distributed.
sentences.chinese: 採取從集中式到分佈式的控制範圍。

sentences.english: In chapter 5, distributed track-to-track fusion algorithms are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第五章研究分佈式航跡融合算法。

sentences.english: A physically-based distributed hydrological model of forest watershed is developed.
sentences.chinese: 構建了森林流域基於物理過程的分佈式水文模型。

sentences.english: The Integrated Network Management System Platform (INMS) is a distributed application.
sentences.chinese: 綜合網管系統是典型的分佈式應用。

sentences.english: In distributed systems, there can be many servers of a particular type, e.g., multiple file servers or multiple network name servers.
sentences.chinese: 在分佈式系統裏，有多種類型的服務器。
